channel.title: Can't find Main, Red X
channel.description:
Edit: I'm currently loading MoparS and it looks like it's going to run... I didn't have the most updated version of Java I guess.... My bad srry, it was an easy fix though luckly. Hope it runs now
So I tried running moparscape off the site, it shows the java icon for a bit, but then it switchs to a red X. I am not sure what is causing this, going to see if there's an update right now that I need but I don't belive so. I would like to play with other people and I belive this is where most play.
My other bigger problem is when I downloaded moparscape to run my own server it says it can't find the main class. I run the .jar and .bat file types but nether of them work. So if someone can please explain to me how to find the main class, or if I installed them wrong and how to fix it that would be great. See I would also like to host a server so my buds can play, so this is important.
Any help in ether of this problems would be greatly appreciated. Tyvm in advance. :)

item.title: Can't find Main, Red X
item.dc:creator: @elfavice elfavice
